alert.note: Alert for Brown (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 3:11PM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River At Columbia affecting Brown County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River At Columbia. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Significant amounts of agricultural lands are flooded * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:15 PM CDT Wednesday was 14.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Sunday evening by 1015 PM CDT.
